cards.title: Baccai Rampage
cards.description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rampaging Baccai</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
cards.flavorText: The baccai are twisted, warped versions of what they might have been - had they become part of the Ascended Host - and the rage they feel at their failure must be unleashed somewhere.

cards.title: Balesight
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
cards.flavorText: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.title: Black Powder Grenade
cards.description: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.

cards.title: Blade of Ledros
cards.description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
cards.flavorText: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.

cards.title: Bladesurge
cards.description: Swap <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Irelia</style></link> with an ally.
cards.flavorText: "Follow my lead!" - Irelia

cards.title: Blinding Crest
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: Some Solari claim the sunhawk's brilliant gleam is the bird trying to send a signal to The Immortal Fire herself.

cards.title: Blue Card
cards.description:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Bullet Time
cards.description: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...

cards.title: Bullseye
cards.description: Deal 1 to an enemy.
cards.flavorText: Gotcha.

cards.title: Cannon Barrage
cards.description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
cards.flavorText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.

cards.title: Caustic Cask
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
cards.flavorText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman

cards.title: Circuit Breaker
cards.description: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: It takes a lot to upset a group of chirean, but when they get mad, everyone's gonna know about it.

cards.title: Claim
cards.description: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
cards.flavorText: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika

cards.title: Conservator's Judgment
cards.description: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
cards.flavorText: "We are where both gods and men find their end." - Sanctum Conservator

cards.title: Crackshot
cards.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair

cards.title: Crimson Pact
cards.description: For each attacking ally on <link=card.vlad><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link>'s right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Delicious." - Vladimir

cards.title: Destructive Ray
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks.
cards.flavorText: The earth shall break.

cards.title: Devour
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
cards.flavorText:
"She swallowed me whole, me skiff and me soul,
So I'm singin' this song in her belly,
And now I must wait 'til I meet my fate,
In the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

cards.title: Dominus Destruction
cards.description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "I will spare no one!" - Renekton

cards.title: Dragon's Rage
cards.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

cards.title: Extinguishing Ray
cards.description: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
cards.flavorText: The people shall perish.

cards.title: Face-Melter
cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies.
cards.flavorText: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder

cards.title: Fading Memories
cards.description: Pick a follower. Create an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it in hand.
cards.flavorText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.

cards.title: Fatal Strike
cards.description: If you have an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, kill <link=card.Kalgren><style=AssociatedCard>Ren Shadowblade</style></link>'s blocker.
cards.flavorText: "As darkness falls, shadows lengthen and lives are cut short..."

cards.title: Final Spark
cards.description: Deal 4 to an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux

cards.title: Frozen Tomb
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
cards.flavorText: "Our lady will bury this world and all you know in ice." - Draklorn Inquisitor

cards.title: Glacial Storm
cards.description: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.

cards.title: Glacial Storm
cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: The storm that comes before the calm.

cards.title: Gold Card
cards.description: Deal 2 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Gouge
cards.description: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
cards.flavorText: "It's not the sharpness of the claws you've got to look out for, it's the appetite of the beast that's grown 'em." - Basilisk trainer

cards.title: Impersonate
cards.description: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
cards.flavorText: Definitely not a pair of yordles in a suit.

cards.title: Instant Century
cards.description: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> a landmark 4 rounds.
cards.flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean

cards.title: Instant Century
cards.description: Summon a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean

cards.title: Instant Century
cards.description: Summon a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link>, or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> a landmark 4 rounds.
cards.flavorText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'..." - Zilean

cards.title: Love Tap
cards.description: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>
cards.flavorText: "Your tricks ain't worth the sand you're standing on, kid." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>
cards.flavorText: "If I can't get past you, I'll just go through you." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>
cards.flavorText: "Try turning me down." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>
cards.flavorText: "Yeah, you better be afraid." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
cards.flavorText: "Nothin' better than a payday." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.flavorText: "Go on. Gimme your best shot. Then it's my turn." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>
cards.flavorText: "Quick as a flash." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.flavorText: "The best just got better." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.flavorText: "Let's cut 'em down to size." - Sivir

cards.title: Lucky Find
cards.description: <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>
cards.flavorText: "Can't spend your earnings if you're dead." - Sivir

cards.title: Magnum Opus
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
cards.flavorText: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza

cards.title: Mischief
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
cards.flavorText: "Hahahaha, lookit 'em GO!  They're just. So. Fast! Is your head spinning too?!" - Zoe

cards.title: Mk0: Windup Shredder
cards.flavorText:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface

cards.title: Moonsilver
cards.description: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
cards.flavorText: "Each full moon bathes our world in Her silver glow, revealing paths not yet trod, stories not yet told." - Lunari Priestess

cards.title: Night Harvest
cards.description: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
cards.flavorText: Thin the herd.

cards.title: Paralyzing Bite
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: It was not the kiss he had in mind.

cards.title: Pesky Specter
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
cards.flavorText: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.

cards.title: Poison Puffcap
cards.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
cards.flavorText:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

cards.title: Poro Cannon
cards.description:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Daring Poros</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.

cards.title: Powder Keg
cards.description:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal <style=Variable>1</style> extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying

cards.title: Powderful Explosion
cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Blow 'em to the depths!" - Gangplank

cards.title: Prey
cards.flavorText: "They flicker through the dark forest, dotting the treeline like stars in the night sky, unaware of their pursuers." - Lamb

cards.title: Production Surge
cards.description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
cards.flavorText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger

cards.title: Ravenous Butcher
cards.description: To play me, kill an ally.
cards.flavorText: You are what you eat.

cards.title: Reckless Research
cards.description: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
cards.flavorText: Progress, whatever the price.

cards.title: Red Card
cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Restored Sun Disc
cards.description:
Immediately draw 1 of each of your Ascended allies.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascended allies are level 3.
cards.flavorText: "Shurima has known no glory like today. Come, bask in the light of our sun!" - Voice of the Risen

cards.title: Rite of Calling
cards.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
cards.flavorText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus

cards.title: Rite of Calling
cards.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.

cards.title: Rite of Calling
cards.description: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.

cards.title: Sabotage
cards.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur

cards.title: Seed of Strength
cards.description: Grant an ally +3|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"OH I FORGOT. Okay so you're probabab... probababer... problee thinkin' dat your legs are like WOWOW tired right now, but I seen the people who walk around here a lot, an' sooner or later dey get ALL KINDSA muscles! So keep at it, and let's GO! AGAIN!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2.1

cards.title: Shaken Ground
cards.description: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Spike is not a morning person..." - Malphite

cards.title: Sky Charge
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The Solari did not believe that another light could blind--a lesson the Lunari would readily teach.

cards.title: Skyward Strikes
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
cards.flavorText: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand

cards.title: Sleep with the Fishes
cards.description: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Daub 'em with your blood, and set the sharks loose." - Jack, the Winner

cards.title: Solar Flare
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: "The closer they stretch toward the heavens, the more the sun will burn them." - Leona

cards.title: Spinning Axe
cards.description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena regular

cards.title: Staggering Strikes
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
cards.flavorText: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser

cards.title: Tarkaz's Fury
cards.description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
cards.flavorText: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere

cards.title: Teen Spirit
cards.description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary

cards.title: The Second Death
cards.description: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "Eventually all will be forgotten." - The Etherfiend

cards.title: The Serpent
cards.flavorText:
"During Targon's first equinox, the people of the mountain attempted their first truce. But as their leaders laid their weapons down, one suddenly cried out in pain! Soldiers drew their spears, and all thoughts of peace were lost. Little did they know the true betrayer was a serpent hidden beneath their feet, forevermore a sign of violent times." 
- Targonian folk tale

cards.title: Thermogenic Beam
cards.description:
To play, spend all your mana.
<style=Variable>Deal that much to a unit.</style>
cards.flavorText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter

cards.title: Threaded Volley
cards.description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
cards.flavorText: "Throw another rock!" - Taliyah

cards.title: Torment
cards.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: What knows you better than your own mind? What can torment you more exquisitely than your own dreams?

cards.title: Undermine
cards.description: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Time to go!" - Boomcrew Rookie

cards.title: Warning Shot
cards.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer

cards.title: Absorb Soul
cards.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 4 from an ally.
cards.flavorText: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh

cards.title: Adaptatron 3000
cards.description: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
cards.flavorText: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger

cards.title: Affectionate Poro
cards.flavorText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius

cards.title: Ancient Preparations
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.

cards.title: Armed Gearhead
cards.flavorText: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."

cards.title: Astute Academic
cards.description: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.

cards.title: Baccai Reaper
cards.description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Barkbeast
cards.description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.

cards.title: Battlefield Prowess
cards.description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle

cards.title: Blade
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me when I leave combat.
cards.flavorText: "Keep your skills sharp--it is not only the blade that strikes, but the hand behind it." - Irelia

cards.title: Blade Squire
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."

cards.title: Blade of the Exile
cards.description: Grant an ally +2|+0, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "But a warrior is more than their weapon alone. They must know power, but also consequence, forgiveness, and redemption." -  Riven

cards.title: Blade's Edge
cards.description: Deal 1 to anything.
cards.flavorText: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina

cards.title: Bloodthirsty Marauder
cards.flavorText: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.

cards.title: Brittle Steel
cards.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy with 3 or less Health.
cards.flavorText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum

cards.title: Buried Sun Disc
cards.description:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 25</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>Restore the Sun Disc</style></link>.
When an Ascended ally levels up, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 10 rounds.
cards.flavorText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.

cards.title: Catastrophe
cards.flavorText: Your end is MEOW.

cards.title: Chain Vest
cards.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.

cards.title: Chip
cards.description: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
cards.flavorText:
"Okay so hello I'm Chip an' I'm here to show you Targon! It's wowow big an' tall so I hope you got good shoes for da walkin'! Let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 1

cards.title: Cithria of Cloudfield
cards.flavorText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."

cards.title: Clockling
cards.flavorText: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.

cards.title: Concurrent Timelines
cards.description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
cards.flavorText: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko

cards.title: Counterfeit Copies
cards.description: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
cards.flavorText: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.

cards.title: Crackshot Corsair
cards.description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."

cards.title: Crawling Sensation
cards.description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

cards.title: Crimson Bloodletter
cards.description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple

cards.title: Crusty Codger
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
cards.flavorText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus

cards.title: Dancing Droplet
cards.description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk

cards.title: Daring Poro
cards.flavorText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.

cards.title: Death Ray - Mk 1
cards.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
cards.flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations

cards.title: Destined Poro
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.

cards.title: Dragon Chow
cards.description: When you play a Dragon, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> me and you draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer

cards.title: Draven's Biggest Fan
cards.description: When I'm summoned, move <link=card.dravenRef><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
cards.flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"

cards.title: Dreg Dredgers
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
cards.flavorText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.

cards.title: Dunekeeper
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."

cards.title: Duskpetal Dust
cards.description: The next unit with <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> you play this round costs 1 less.
cards.flavorText: The fragrance of the duskpetal is like none other. Sweet and strange, but fleeting, it is delicate as moonlight itself.

cards.title: Eggnivia
cards.flavorText: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.

cards.title: Elise's Crawling Sensation
cards.description:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Elise</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

cards.title: Elixir of Iron
cards.description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper

cards.title: Elixir of Wrath
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom

cards.title: Enraged Yeti
cards.flavorText: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

cards.title: Equinox
cards.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
cards.flavorText: In the space between the stars, there is absolute silence.

cards.title: Exalted Poro
cards.description: I have 3 random keywords.
cards.flavorText: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.

cards.title: Exhaust
cards.description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.

cards.title: First Wave
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: What is death without life?

cards.title: Fizz
cards.description: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...

cards.title: Fizz
cards.description:
When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Chum the Waters</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.

cards.title: Flawless Duet
cards.description: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 2.
cards.flavorText: "There is no song more perfect than that of two voices entwined in harmony..." - Blossoming Blade

cards.title: Fleetfeather Tracker
cards.description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.

cards.title: Flower Child
cards.description: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.

cards.title: Frozen Thrall
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 8</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frostguard Thrall</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...

cards.title: Gangplank's Parrrley
cards.description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

cards.title: Gem
cards.description:
Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
Can't be cast in combat or in response to a spell.
cards.flavorText: "You don't need to see to believe. Just have a little faith." - Tyari the Traveler

cards.title: Ghost
cards.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed

cards.title: Gift Giver
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."

cards.title: Gifts From Beyond
cards.description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune

cards.title: Glinting Blade Fragment
cards.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Can't be cast in combat or in response to a spell.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "A warrior must know their weapon's history... every bloody piece." - Riven

cards.title: Go Hard
cards.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit and create 2 copies of me in your deck. Once you've cast me <style=Variable>3</style> times, transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Pack Your Bags</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'

cards.title: Greenglade Caretaker
cards.description: When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, grant me +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."

cards.title: Guile
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc

cards.title: Hapless Aristocrat
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"

cards.title: Health Potion
cards.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
cards.flavorText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.

cards.title: Heavy Blade Fragment
cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
Can't be cast in combat or in response to a spell.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "A warrior must know the weight of their weapon, burdened heavy with guilt." - Riven

cards.title: Help, Pix!
cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> or an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Can't be cast in combat or in response to a spell.
cards.flavorText: Pix protec... or Pix attac...?

cards.title: Hex Core Upgrade
cards.description: Grant <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> a random keyword.
cards.flavorText: Humanity is destined to break free from the confines of flesh. We must become more. We must augment. We must evolve!" - Viktor

cards.title: Ignition
cards.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText:
"If they do not choose to add metal to their bodies, I will deliver metal to them instead. That was a humorous remark. Ha."
- Ballistic Bot

cards.title: Imagined Possibilities
cards.description: Create a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> in hand, or <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your landmarks 1 round.
cards.flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

cards.title: Imagined Possibilities
cards.description: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> your landmarks 1 round.
cards.flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

cards.title: Imagined Possibilities
cards.description: Create a random landmark with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

cards.title: Inspiring Mentor
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”

cards.title: Jagged Butcher
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.

cards.title: Jailbreak
cards.description: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
cards.flavorText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

cards.title: Jettison
cards.description: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 4.
cards.flavorText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer

cards.title: Jubilant Poro
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Oho, there's a good lad! Even the coldest winter melts into spring." - Poro Herder

cards.title: Jury-Rig
cards.description: When cast or discarded, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttler</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.

cards.title: Keen Blade Fragment
cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
Can't be cast in combat or in response to a spell.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "A warrior must know the sharpness of their blade, an edge that cuts both friends and foes." - Riven

cards.title: Last Wind
cards.description: To play me, kill an ally.
cards.flavorText: What is life without death?

cards.title: Legion Rearguard
cards.flavorText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.

cards.title: Legion Saboteur
cards.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain

cards.title: Lonely Poro
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
cards.flavorText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder

cards.title: Lunari Duskbringer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Duskpetal Dust</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."

cards.title: Mageseeker Conservator
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
cards.flavorText:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook

cards.title: Mark of the Isles
cards.description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Power, but at what cost?

cards.title: Messenger's Sigil
cards.description: Create 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>The Messengers</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess

cards.title: Mk1: Wrenchbot
cards.flavorText:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1

cards.title: Mushroom Cloud
cards.description: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
cards.flavorText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

cards.title: Navori Bladescout
cards.description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"

cards.title: Nimble Poro
cards.flavorText: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand

cards.title: Oblivious Islander
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and reduce its cost by 1.
cards.flavorText: Oh, the poor lad...

cards.title: Omen Hawk
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen

cards.title: Parrrley
cards.description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

cards.title: Penitent Squire
cards.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.

cards.title: Pix!
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu

cards.title: Plucky Poro
cards.flavorText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant

cards.title: Plunder Poro
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me 2 random keywords.
cards.flavorText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank

cards.title: Pool Shark
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler

cards.title: Porofly
cards.flavorText: In space, no one can hear you squee.

cards.title: Powder Monkey
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Mischievous little scamps, ain't they? More help than they seem, but word is they've got explosive tempers..." - Syren deckhand

cards.title: Precious Pet
cards.flavorText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.

cards.title: Prowling Cutthroat
cards.flavorText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."

cards.title: Radiant Strike
cards.description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian

cards.title: Ranger's Resolve
cards.description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden

cards.title: Ravenous Flock
cards.description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

cards.title: Recall
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
cards.flavorText: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.

cards.title: Resonating Strike
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "...master the enemy." - Lee Sin

cards.title: Return
cards.description: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
cards.flavorText: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.

cards.title: Rummage
cards.description:
Discard 2 to draw 2.
If you have exactly 1 other card in hand, discard 1 to draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx

cards.title: Rush
cards.description: Give an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.

cards.title: Sanctuary
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
Can't be cast in combat or in response to a spell.
cards.flavorText: "The monastery welcomes all who seek refuge." - Elder Souma

cards.title: Sand Soldier
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Azir's legions were reputed to be unstoppable even before Shurima was reborn, but now they are truly innumerable.

cards.title: Sapling
cards.flavorText: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal

cards.title: Sapling Toss
cards.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling

cards.title: Scrap Scuttler
cards.flavorText: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!

cards.title: Scrying Sands
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
cards.flavorText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir

cards.title: Shadow Apprentice
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi

cards.title: Shadow Fiend
cards.flavorText: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed

cards.title: Shakedown
cards.description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry

cards.title: Shaped Stone
cards.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
cards.flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah

cards.title: Shellshocker
cards.flavorText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand

cards.title: Shroud of Darkness
cards.description: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter

cards.title: Sinister Poro
cards.flavorText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.

cards.title: Snow Hare
cards.flavorText:
"Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."
- Avarosan proverb

cards.title: Solari Soldier
cards.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.

cards.title: Spacey Sketcher
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
cards.flavorText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."

cards.title: Sparring Student
cards.description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"

cards.title: Spell Thief
cards.description: Pick 1 of 3 enemy spells played this game and create a copy in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe

cards.title: Spiderling
cards.flavorText: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

cards.title: Spring Gifts
cards.description: Fully heal an ally.
cards.flavorText: "Let the springs soothe that which ails you." - Spring Guardian

cards.title: Squirrel
cards.flavorText: A fae flash knocked him to the floor! Newly keen ears heard a yordle's fading laughter, and he looked down to see furry paws, attached to furry arms...

cards.title: Star Shepherd
cards.description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"

cards.title: Stoneweaving
cards.description: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah

cards.title: Stress Testing
cards.description: Remove <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

cards.title: Stygian Onlooker
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.

cards.title: Super Mega Death Rocket!
cards.description: Deal 4 to the enemy nexus and 1 to all enemies.
cards.flavorText: "See ya!" - Jinx

cards.title: Swain's Ravenous Flock
cards.description:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

cards.title: Taliyah's Stoneweaving
cards.description:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah

cards.title: Tattered Banner
cards.description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard

cards.title: Teemo
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Double the <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
cards.flavorText: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"

cards.title: Teemo
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
cards.flavorText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."

cards.title: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud
cards.description:
Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Teemo</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

cards.title: The Charger
cards.flavorText: "The gold of the sun adorns his horns, and its fire lights his heart. Let the thunder of our shields ring out like the thunder of his hooves across the horizon!" - Solari battle prayer

cards.title: The Flight
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
cards.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer

cards.title: The Wings and The Wave
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Play me as <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>First Wave</style></link> or <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Last Wind</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The Kinkou speak of only two gods: the first wave, who cradles life in its warm waters, and the last wind, who snatches life with its final, frigid sighs.

cards.title: Thrashing Snapper
cards.description: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: Surprised by the resilience of the creature they'd found on the shore of Ionia, the young general insisted on taking it back home, eager to find out its true strength.

cards.title: Three Sisters
cards.description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Flash Freeze</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Fury of the North</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Entomb</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.

cards.title: Unleashed Spirit
cards.flavorText: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.

cards.title: Unscarred Reaver
cards.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna

cards.title: Viktor's Death Ray - Mk 1
cards.description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations

cards.title: Warden's Prey
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand another <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> follower that costs 3 or less.
cards.flavorText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…

cards.title: Ye Been Warned
cards.description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand

cards.title: Yeti Yearling
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yetis</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper

cards.title: Zaunite Urchin
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
cards.flavorText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"

cards.title: Zoe
cards.description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Behold the Infinite </style></link> that costs 0 in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Ah, the vastness of space and a myriad realities stretched, squished, and squeezed out before us! Maaaaaybe we'll even see my favorite space doggy!"

cards.title: Zoe
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Supercool Starchart</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
cards.flavorText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."

cards.title: Academy Prodigy
cards.flavorText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.

cards.title: An Acquired Taste
cards.description: <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> swallows an enemy unit. It <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> him, then he <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> it.
cards.flavorText: "You had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool who let me in..." - Tahm Kench

cards.title: Ancestral Boon
cards.description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.

cards.title: Ancient Hourglass
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> in its place.
cards.flavorText:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher

cards.title: Aphelios' Gifts From Beyond
cards.description:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aphelios</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune

cards.title: Apprehend
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
If you have a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link>, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius

cards.title: Arachnoid Horror
cards.flavorText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.

cards.title: Arena Battlecaster
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.

cards.title: Arena Bookie
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."

cards.title: Aspiring Chronomancer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.

cards.title: Avarosan Sentry
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."

cards.title: Ballistic Bot
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ignition</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011

cards.title: Battlesmith
cards.description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: Wars are won in the forge.

cards.title: Behold the Infinite
cards.description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?

cards.title: Black Market Merchant
cards.description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
cards.flavorText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"

cards.title: Black Rose Spy
cards.description: <link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally that <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> this round. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."

cards.title: Blinding Assault
cards.description: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

cards.title: Blood for Blood
cards.description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
cards.flavorText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.

cards.title: Blue Sentinel
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crest of Insight</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Okay EV-ER-EE-ONE say "HI BLU!" HI BLU! Okay one time I thought he was like "HI BLU!" back, but now dat I think about it might have been my voice bouncin' off da walls. OH WELL he's all magical and stuff and also blue so if you ask me he doesn't even NEED to speak! OKAY BYE BLUE LET'S GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 5

cards.title: Bone Skewer
cards.description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke

cards.title: Boomcrew Rookie
cards.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."

cards.title: Boxtopus
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to me.
cards.flavorText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry

cards.title: Brightsteel Protector
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III

cards.title: Brothers' Bond
cards.description: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran

cards.title: Calculated Creations
cards.description: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Armed Gearhead</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Ballistic Bot</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Nyandroid</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor

cards.title: Calibrum
cards.description: Deal 3 to a follower. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune

cards.title: Calibrum
cards.description: Deal 3 to a follower. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune

cards.title: Caught in the Cold
cards.description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani

cards.title: Chempunk Pickpocket
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy's deck.
cards.flavorText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.

cards.title: Chirean Sumpworker
cards.description: When you summon another <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworker</style></link>, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> me and transform allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Chirean Sumpworkers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Posses</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.

cards.title: Claws of the Dragon
cards.description: Summon me from hand once you've played 2 spells this round.
cards.flavorText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.title: Clockwork Curator
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> an allied landmark 2 rounds.
cards.flavorText: The constructs that guard Zilean's tower are able to withstand the harsh desert for millennia, and not just for their clever construction.

cards.title: Clump of Whumps
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Cloud</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler

cards.title: Coral Creatures
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
cards.flavorText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.

cards.title: Crescendum
cards.description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>, activate it. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune

cards.title: Crescendum
cards.description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>, activate it. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune

cards.title: Crest of Insight
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Get an extra mana gem this round.
cards.flavorText: "Dis is Blu's faaaaaavorite place inna whole wide world! He says it's SUPER magical! Oooh, ahhh!" - Chip

cards.title: Crimson Aristocrat
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."

cards.title: Crimson Disciple
cards.description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"

cards.title: Crystal Arrow
cards.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "All the world on one arrow." - Ashe

cards.title: Cursed Keeper
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Escaped Abomination</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.

cards.title: Death Lotus
cards.description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
cards.flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

cards.title: Death Ray - Mk 2
cards.description: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 3</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
cards.flavorText:
"Altered beam transmission medium, adjusted lenses to optimal focal distances, internal mirrors polished and positioned. Intensity increased tenfold. But it must improve. I MUST IMPROVE!"
- Viktor's design annotations

cards.title: Diana
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: Diana raced down the mountain, sword drawn and coated with duskpetal dust. She knew Leona would find her--she was counting on it. Her heart fluttered with anxious anticipation, and she breathed deeply to still it. This time upon their meeting, she would have the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.

cards.title: Diana
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.

cards.title: Diana's Pale Cascade
cards.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Diana</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana

cards.title: Dragon's Protection
cards.description: Grant an ally +0|+3.
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon

cards.title: Dragonguard Lieutenant
cards.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."

cards.title: Dragonling
cards.flavorText: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon

cards.title: Dreadway Deckhand
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."

cards.title: Eager Apprentice
cards.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
cards.flavorText: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.

cards.title: Egghead Researcher
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
cards.flavorText:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

cards.title: Elise
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.

cards.title: Emperor's Dais
cards.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.

cards.title: Emperor's Guard
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
cards.flavorText: The emperor's golden guard moves as one, a succession of regimented warriors that is as terrifying as it is impressive to behold.

cards.title: Emperor's Prosperity
cards.description: Draw 2.
cards.flavorText: Birds found in the desert climes are all considered symbols of Azir, and Shurimans find their presence a good omen.

cards.title: Entreat
cards.description: Draw a champion.
cards.flavorText: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry

cards.title: Escaped Abomination
cards.flavorText: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.

cards.title: Evershade Stalker
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
cards.flavorText: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter

cards.title: Eye of the Dragon
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link> if you cast 2+ spells last round<style=Variable></style>.
cards.flavorText:
