"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon

cards.title: Ezreal's Mystic Shot
cards.description:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ezreal</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

cards.title: Faces of the Old Ones
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant

cards.title: Fading Icon
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?

cards.title: Fae Bladetwirler
cards.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit, grant me +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"

cards.title: Feral Mystic
cards.description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
cards.flavorText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia

cards.title: Flame Chompers!
cards.description: When I'm discarded, summon me.
cards.flavorText: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx

cards.title: Fortune Croaker
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard

cards.title: Glimpse Beyond
cards.description: Kill an ally to draw 2.
cards.flavorText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

cards.title: Golden Narwhal
cards.flavorText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.

cards.title: Gravitum
cards.description: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune

cards.title: Gravitum
cards.description: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune

cards.title: Greenglade Duo
cards.description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"

cards.title: Greenglade Lookout
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
cards.flavorText: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."

cards.title: Guiding Touch
cards.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.

cards.title: Haunted Relic
cards.description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Unleashed Spirits</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.

cards.title: Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows
cards.description:
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Hecarim</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

cards.title: Herald of Dragons
cards.description: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
cards.flavorText: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.

cards.title: Herald of Spring
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem

cards.title: Hibernating Rockbear
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary

cards.title: Hired Gun
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."

cards.title: Honored Lord
cards.description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.

cards.title: House Spider
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise

cards.title: Hunt the Weak
cards.description: Your opponent discards the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> follower from hand.
cards.flavorText: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker

cards.title: Icevale Archer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.

cards.title: Imperial Demolitionist
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."

cards.title: Infernum
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune

cards.title: Infernum
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune

cards.title: Insight of Ages
cards.description:
Create in hand another spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
cards.flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

cards.title: Intrepid Mariner
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.

cards.title: Iterative Improvement
cards.description: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic

cards.title: Jagged Taskmaster
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant 1 cost allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.

cards.title: Karma's Insight of Ages
cards.description:
Create in hand another spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Karma</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

cards.title: Katarina's Death Lotus
cards.description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Katarina</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

cards.title: Keeper of Masks
cards.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."

cards.title: Ki Guardian
cards.description:
Grant <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen

cards.title: Lamb's Respite
cards.description: Give the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
cards.flavorText: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb

cards.title: Lead and Follow
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

cards.title: Legion Drummer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.

cards.title: Legion Grenadier
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.

cards.title: Lucian
cards.flavorText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

cards.title: Lucian
cards.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

cards.title: Lunari Shadestalker
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest

cards.title: Mageseeker Persuader
cards.description: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
cards.flavorText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"

cards.title: Mask Mother
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
cards.flavorText: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?

cards.title: Mirror Image
cards.description: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
cards.flavorText: "Seeing double?" - LeBlanc

cards.title: Mistwraith
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.

cards.title: Mk2: Evolution Turret
cards.flavorText:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2

cards.title: Monkey Business
cards.description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Summon another at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer

cards.title: Moonglow
cards.description: Grant an ally +0|+2 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Bathe in Her gentle glow and receive Her blessing." - Lunari Priestess

cards.title: More Powder!
cards.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Barrel!" - Gangplank

cards.title: Mountain Goat
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.

cards.title: Mystic Shot
cards.description: Deal 2 to anything.
cards.flavorText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

cards.title: Navori Brigand
cards.flavorText: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.

cards.title: Navori Conspirator
cards.description: To play me, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
cards.flavorText: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."

cards.title: Navori Highwayman
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> with my stats.
cards.flavorText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”

cards.title: Nocturne's Unspeakable Horror
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nocturne</style></link> in your deck.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random non-champion <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
cards.flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

cards.title: Nopeify!
cards.description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> or <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell that costs 3 or less.
cards.flavorText: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu

cards.title: Onslaught of Shadows
cards.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

cards.title: Pale Cascade
cards.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana

cards.title: Patched Porobot
cards.description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
cards.flavorText: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.

cards.title: Payday
cards.description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir

cards.title: Pick a Card
cards.description: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Poro Herder
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you have a Poro ally.
cards.flavorText: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.

cards.title: Preservarium
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.

cards.title: Purify
cards.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
cards.flavorText:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook

cards.title: Quinn's Blinding Assault
cards.description:
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Quinn</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

cards.title: Renekton's Ruthless Predator
cards.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton

cards.title: Retreat
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Return</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...

cards.title: Ribbon Dancer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
cards.flavorText: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"

cards.title: Riven's Weapon Hilt
cards.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Riven</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker

cards.title: Rock Hopper
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary

cards.title: Rockfall Path
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText:
"Okay so EV-ER-EE-BODY watch out here cuz dis is a BIG DROP an' I've fallen down here a few times and LEMME TELL YOU it's a long way down! An' I'm made of wok so I just bounce, but dat's not true for you guys... so be caref--ooh dere's Cliff! Let's go say hi!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 3

cards.title: Roiling Sands
cards.description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.

cards.title: Ruinous Path
cards.description:
Draw 1.
If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> a unit this round, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.

cards.title: Runeweaver
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."

cards.title: Ruthless Predator
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Shred them!" - Renekton

cards.title: Ruthless Raider
cards.flavorText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.

cards.title: Sandstone Charger
cards.flavorText: "They appeared out of nowhere, made up of swirling sands! Then, after they had dispatched our forces, their forms simply... disappeared, melted back into the desert." - Desert Survivor

cards.title: Scrapdash Assembly
cards.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttlers</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.

cards.title: Sea Scarab
cards.description:
When another ally dies, or <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain

cards.title: Severum
cards.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "From darkness, light." - Alune

cards.title: Severum
cards.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.NextWeapon><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "From darkness, light." - Alune

cards.title: Shared Spoils
cards.description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 of them.
cards.flavorText: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider

cards.title: Shark Chariot
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: The next time an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally attacks, revive me attacking.
cards.flavorText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon

cards.title: Sharpsight
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+2 and "I can block units with <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>" this round.
cards.flavorText: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.

cards.title: Shatter
cards.description: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> it.
cards.flavorText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen

cards.title: Silent Shadowseer
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."

cards.title: Single Combat
cards.description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
cards.flavorText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora

cards.title: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe

cards.title: Solari Shieldbearer
cards.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +0|+4 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.

cards.title: Solari Sunhawk
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: The Solari believe that it was Targon's sunhawks--brilliant as they are--who caught the Immortal Fire's attention, and who subsequently inspired her cycle of death and rebirth.

cards.title: Song of the Isles
cards.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler

cards.title: Sonic Wave
cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin

cards.title: Soothsayer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Ah, you did not expect to see water in the middle of the desert. Worry not. Come, drink your fill, wash your feet. Rest in the shade awhile. This is Azir's new Shurima, and it is an oasis."

cards.title: Soul Shepherd
cards.description: When you summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally, grant it +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.

cards.title: Sown Seeds
cards.description: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma

cards.title: Sparklefly
cards.flavorText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess

cards.title: Spectral Rider
cards.flavorText: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.

cards.title: Spider Queen Elise
cards.description: Other Spider allies have <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Beauty is in the many eyes of the beholder.

cards.title: Stalking Shadows
cards.description:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Go... surround them..." - Nocturne

cards.title: Stalking Wolf
cards.description: When I'm summoned, the enemy summons a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Snow Hare</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb

cards.title: Star Spring
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse

cards.title: Starbone
cards.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>behold</style></link> <link=card.behold><style=AssociatedCard>The Messenger</style></link>, grant Celestial allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
cards.flavorText:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer

cards.title: Starlit Seer
cards.description: When you cast a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."

cards.title: Starry Scamp
cards.description: I cost 2 less if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial.
cards.flavorText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."

cards.title: Startipped Peak
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
cards.flavorText: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.

cards.title: Startled Stomper
cards.flavorText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe

cards.title: Stasis Statue
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
cards.flavorText:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers

cards.title: Steel Tempest
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
cards.flavorText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo

cards.title: Stirred Spirits
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.

cards.title: Stony Suppressor
cards.description: ALL spells cost 1 more.
cards.flavorText: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.

cards.title: Sumpworks Map
cards.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger

cards.title: Sumpworks Posse
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "They're sweet enough on their own, sure, but get a bunch of 'em together, and before you know it, they've built some madcap machine and are off knockin' down some part of the Lanes." - Zaunite machinist

cards.title: Sunblessed Vigor
cards.description: Grant an ally +0|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer

cards.title: Supercool Starchart
cards.description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
cards.flavorText: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe

cards.title: Syncopation
cards.description: Swap 2 allies.
cards.flavorText: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

cards.title: The Messenger
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
cards.flavorText:
"As leaves unfurl from barren branches, the Lady of Spring sends her messenger to inform the Lord of Winter of the changing season. The messenger's bark startles the stars into new places in the sky, while his loyal heart warms the land." 
- Song of the Seasons

cards.title: The Sky Shadows
cards.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>behold</style></link> a <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card.
cards.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer

cards.title: Thorny Toad
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
cards.flavorText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal

cards.title: Time Bomb
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> other allied Time Bombs 1 round.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Using time "constructively" can also mean "destructively."

cards.title: Time in a Bottle
cards.description: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link> and <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> an allied landmark 2 rounds.
cards.flavorText: "If only you saw time as I do, you would know it is not immutable." - Zilean

cards.title: Trail of Evidence
cards.description: Create in hand a 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."

cards.title: Transfusion
cards.description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
cards.flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

cards.title: Trifarian Gloryseeker
cards.flavorText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.

cards.title: Trifarian Hopeful
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
cards.flavorText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran

cards.title: Troll Chant
cards.description: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
cards.flavorText: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.

cards.title: Troll Gifts
cards.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
cards.flavorText: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.

cards.title: Troll Scavenger
cards.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
cards.flavorText:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.

cards.title: Tyari the Traveler
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
cards.flavorText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.

cards.title: Unspeakable Horror
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random non-champion <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
cards.flavorText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

cards.title: Unstoppable Force
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies.
cards.flavorText: "ROCK. SOLID." - Malphite

cards.title: Unto Dusk
cards.description:
Draw 1.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
cards.flavorText: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother

cards.title: Unworthy
cards.description:
Give an enemy follower <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
cards.flavorText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen

cards.title: Valor
cards.flavorText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.

cards.title: Vanguard Defender
cards.flavorText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."

cards.title: Vanguard Lookout
cards.flavorText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.

cards.title: Veteran Investigator
cards.description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
cards.flavorText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.

cards.title: Vile Feast
cards.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

cards.title: Vladimir's Transfusion
cards.description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

cards.title: Waking Sands
cards.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "The box might be worth something, but whatever's inside sure as sand isn't. By which I mean, it's not worth opening. Speaking from experience, here." - Sivir

cards.title: War Chefs
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.

cards.title: Weapon Hilt
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker

cards.title: Yasuo's Steel Tempest
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Yasuo</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo

cards.title: Young Witch
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> and +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!

cards.title: Zilean
cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of each non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> card I saw you play last round.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create 4 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Bombs</style></link> in your deck, then <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Countless possibilities stretched before and behind him. He saw them all at once, a dizzying array that only he could decipher. With a single gesture, Zilean could unfold entire timelines -- but none had yet shown him how to save Icathia.

cards.title: Zilean
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create 4 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Time Bombs</style></link> in your deck, then <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.

cards.title: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zoe</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe

cards.title: Amateur Aeronaut
cards.flavorText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer

cards.title: Aphelios
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
cards.flavorText: "...it is Aphelios and Alune who will best teach them.." - Lunari wanespeaker

cards.title: Aphelios
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker

cards.title: Arachnoid Sentry
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat

cards.title: Arise!
cards.description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir

cards.title: Ashe's Flash Freeze
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ashe</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

cards.title: Assembly Bot
cards.description: When you cast a spell, grant me +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick

cards.title: Avarosan Marksman
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an enemy.
cards.flavorText: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.

cards.title: Avarosan Trapper
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."

cards.title: Azir
cards.description:
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Short of fulfilling his destiny, Azir's lifelong friend - and newly named brother - hatefully cast him off the dais. In that fateful moment Shurima was cursed, doomed to ruin for thousands of years to follow." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Azir
cards.description:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"The Emperor Azir, though haughty, is generous. Above all, he cares deeply for those who would march alongside him into Shurima's golden future, as the nation rises anew, its people once again united under his rule." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Azir
cards.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Azir's Arise!
cards.description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Azir</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "The order is given." - Azir

cards.title: Bayou Brunch
cards.description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
cards.flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench

cards.title: Black Spear
cards.description: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
cards.flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

cards.title: Blighted Caretaker
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Saplings</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"

cards.title: Boomship
cards.description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link> equal to the amount of damage dealt.
cards.flavorText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor

cards.title: Braum's Take Heart
cards.description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

cards.title: Bubble Bear
cards.flavorText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.

cards.title: Calibrum
cards.description: Deal 3 to a follower. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link> or <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune

cards.title: Call the Wild
cards.description: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
cards.flavorText: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger

cards.title: Cataclysm
cards.description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV

cards.title: Confront
cards.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

cards.title: Crescendum
cards.description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>, activate it. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link> or <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune

cards.title: Crescent Guardian
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription

cards.title: Crescent Strike
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
cards.flavorText: "Even the moon's glow can be blinding." - Diana

cards.title: Crimson Curator
cards.description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
cards.flavorText: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"

cards.title: Crushed Egg
cards.description: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
cards.flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

cards.title: Culling Strike
cards.description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
cards.flavorText: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.

cards.title: Darkwater Scourge
cards.flavorText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.

cards.title: Dauntless Vanguard
cards.flavorText: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

cards.title: Dawnspeakers
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
cards.flavorText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"

cards.title: Deadbloom Wanderer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
cards.flavorText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal

cards.title: Death Mark
cards.description: Remove <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed

cards.title: Death Ray - Mk 3
cards.description: Deal 3 to a unit.
cards.flavorText:
"The beam melts flesh and metal alike with exceptional speed! I have since eagerly integrated it onto my machine body. To see, feel, and dissect the world with such CLARITY... This is the great potential of the human mind unburdened by flesh! A truly glorious evolution!" 
- Viktor's design annotations

cards.title: Death's Hand
cards.description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain

cards.title: Devoted Council
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
cards.flavorText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"

cards.title: Discipline of Force
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.

cards.title: Discipline of Fortitude
cards.description: Give an ally +0|+3 this round.

cards.title: Divergent Paths
cards.description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
cards.flavorText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.

cards.title: Doombeast
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.

cards.title: Double Trouble
cards.description: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
cards.flavorText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

cards.title: Dragon's Clutch
cards.description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager

cards.title: Draven
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axes</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "WHAT'S MY NAME?"

cards.title: Draven
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axe</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."

cards.title: Draven's Whirling Death
cards.description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven

cards.title: Ember Maiden
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
cards.flavorText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme

cards.title: Emerald Awakener
cards.description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
cards.flavorText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."

cards.title: En Garde
cards.description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora

cards.title: Esteemed Hierophant
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Buried Sun Disc</style></link> 3 rounds.
cards.flavorText: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker

cards.title: Ezreal
cards.description:
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
When you cast a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
cards.flavorText: "Impossible is my favorite kind of possible!"

cards.title: Ezreal
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"

cards.title: Fiora
cards.flavorText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."

cards.title: Fiora
cards.description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "... and now I know."

cards.title: Flash Freeze
cards.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

cards.title: Flash of Brilliance
cards.description:
Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
cards.flavorText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.

cards.title: Fledgling Stellacorn
cards.flavorText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars

cards.title: Flurry of Fists
cards.description: Grant an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>. If it already has it, grant it <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link> instead.
cards.flavorText: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon

cards.title: Frenzied Skitterer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
cards.flavorText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise

cards.title: Fresh Offerings
cards.description:
If 3+ allies have died this round, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vilemaw</style></link>.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise

cards.title: Fuzzy Caretaker
cards.description:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.

cards.title: Get Excited!
cards.description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
cards.flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

cards.title: Giddy Sparkleologist
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."

cards.title: Gluttony
cards.description: Kill an ally with <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
cards.flavorText: "SUPPAH TIIIIME!" - Ravenous Butcher

cards.title: Golden Crushbot
cards.flavorText: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.

cards.title: Gravitum
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link> or <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune

cards.title: Greenfang Warden
cards.flavorText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."

cards.title: Greenglade Elder
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.

cards.title: Hatched Egg
cards.description: Draw 2 different Dragons.
cards.flavorText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

cards.title: Hexcore Foundry
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: ALL players draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor

cards.title: Hush
cards.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a unit this round.
cards.flavorText: "They will know serenity." - Soraka

cards.title: Ice Shard
cards.description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
cards.flavorText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra

cards.title: Infernum
cards.description: Give an ally +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link> or <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune

cards.title: Inner Sanctum
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 0. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir

cards.title: Irelia
cards.description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
When allies attack, create a <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Bladesurge</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "...Though our hearts are heavy, we are full of purpose, and return to dance once more."

cards.title: Irelia
cards.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flawless Duet</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."

cards.title: Iron Ballista
cards.flavorText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer

cards.title: Iron Harbinger
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally you have.
cards.flavorText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.

cards.title: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm
cards.description:
An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV

cards.title: Jaull Hunters
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
cards.flavorText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.

cards.title: Jinx's Get Excited!
cards.description:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jinx</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

cards.title: Kalista
cards.flavorText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.

cards.title: Kalista
cards.description: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
cards.flavorText: "The wronged shall have their vengeance!"

cards.title: Kalista's Black Spear
cards.description:
If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kalista</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

cards.title: Katarina
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."

cards.title: Khahiri the Student
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game.
cards.flavorText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"

cards.title: Kindly Tavernkeeper
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
cards.flavorText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"

cards.title: Laurent Duelist
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign

cards.title: Laurent Protege
cards.flavorText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper

cards.title: LeBlanc
cards.description: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mirror Image</style></link> in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "...we all want the same thing."

cards.title: LeBlanc
cards.flavorText: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."

cards.title: Legion Marauder
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant allied Legion Marauders <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.

cards.title: Lissandra
cards.description:
Your Nexus is <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 0 cost <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Shard</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: Few know what Lissandra sacrificed in order to gain power, her ambitions too great to be stymied by mortal trappings.

cards.title: Lissandra
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."

cards.title: Living Shadow
cards.flavorText: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.

cards.title: Lounging Lizard
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
cards.flavorText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker

cards.title: Loyal Badgerbear
cards.flavorText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.

cards.title: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

cards.title: Lulu
cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Help, Pix!</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Oooh! Look, Pix! It's a whole different world out here! Now let's give it lots of colors!"

cards.title: Lulu
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"

cards.title: Lunari Priestess
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening

cards.title: Lure of the Depths
cards.description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
cards.flavorText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.

cards.title: Lux's Prismatic Barrier
cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lux</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

cards.title: Mageseeker Investigator
cards.description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
cards.flavorText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."

cards.title: Make it Rain
cards.description: Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

cards.title: Maokai's Sap Magic
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Maokai</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

cards.title: Mentor of the Stones
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 3 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners

cards.title: Merciless Hunter
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "And... there. Tied up, nice 'n pretty. Renekton likes his meals delivered still-squirming."

cards.title: Might
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius

cards.title: Mighty Poro
cards.flavorText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

cards.title: Mimic
cards.description:
