<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
cards.flavorText: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.

cards.title: Miss Fortune
cards.description: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."

cards.title: Miss Fortune
cards.description: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."

cards.title: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain
cards.description:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

cards.title: Mist's Call
cards.description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
cards.flavorText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

cards.title: Mk3: Apex Turret
cards.flavorText:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3

cards.title: Mobilize
cards.description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
cards.flavorText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen

cards.title: Monastery of Hirana
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sanctuary</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.

cards.title: Monkey Idol
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune

cards.title: Mumblesprite
cards.flavorText: Another mumblesprite burst out, its eyes full of devilish mischief. "No more cheese for Trevor!" Bri announced. The others all nodded.

cards.title: Noxian Fervor
cards.description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
cards.flavorText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain

cards.title: Noxian Guillotine
cards.description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.

cards.title: Nyandroid
cards.flavorText: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."

cards.title: Paddle Star
cards.description: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe

cards.title: Parade Electrorig
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
cards.flavorText: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.

cards.title: Passage Unearned
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

cards.title: Path of Destruction
cards.description: Destroy a landmark.
cards.flavorText: Each summit gave way before them, emboldening their climb and filling their hearts with determination. They would scale Targon.

cards.title: Path of Discovery
cards.description: Draw a landmark.
cards.flavorText: Beyond each summit loomed yet another, but their spirits pushed them onward. They would surmount the peaks of Targon.

cards.title: Patrol Wardens
cards.description: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
cards.flavorText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.

cards.title: Petty Officer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

cards.title: Petty Officer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
cards.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

cards.title: Petty Officer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link> or a random 1 cost follower.
cards.flavorText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

cards.title: Phantom Prankster
cards.description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.

cards.title: Pilfered Goods
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 more.
cards.flavorText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.

cards.title: Pocket Aces
cards.description:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Poro Snax
cards.description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker

cards.title: Prismatic Barrier
cards.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

cards.title: Puffcap Peddler
cards.description: When you cast a spell, plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
cards.flavorText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"

cards.title: Quicksand
cards.description: Give an enemy <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
cards.flavorText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.

cards.title: Reckless Trifarian
cards.flavorText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain

cards.title: Relentless Pursuit
cards.description: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

cards.title: Rimefang Wolf
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
cards.flavorText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.

cards.title: Rising Spell Force
cards.description: Give an ally +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal

cards.title: Riven
cards.description: When you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."

cards.title: Riven
cards.description:
When you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
When my Power is increased for the first time each round, increase it by twice as much.
cards.flavorText: "...and I will not run from those who would break me."

cards.title: Rivershaper
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Draw a spell.
cards.flavorText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."

cards.title: Sai Scout
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary

cards.title: Sap Magic
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
cards.flavorText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

cards.title: Scaled Snapper
cards.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

cards.title: Scaled Snapper
cards.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

cards.title: Scaled Snapper
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
cards.flavorText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

cards.title: Scales of the Dragon
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Protection</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.title: Scarthane Steffen
cards.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
cards.flavorText: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."

cards.title: Scorched Earth
cards.description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
cards.flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker

cards.title: Scribe of Sorrows
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
cards.flavorText: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"

cards.title: Senna, Sentinel of Light
cards.description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

cards.title: Severum
cards.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link> or <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "From darkness, light." - Alune

cards.title: Shadow Assassin
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
cards.flavorText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.

cards.title: Shadowshift
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
cards.flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

cards.title: Sharpened Resolve
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire

cards.title: Shimmering Mirage
cards.description:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: Between the sand, the sun, and the heat, it can be difficult to tell what is real, and what is merely a mirage.

cards.title: Shyvana's Confront
cards.description:
Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shyvana</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

cards.title: Sleight of Hand
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw a random non-champion from the enemy hand.
cards.flavorText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Slotbot
cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.

cards.title: Solari Priestess
cards.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
cards.flavorText: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.

cards.title: Solitary Monk
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all other allies.
cards.flavorText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."

cards.title: Soraka
cards.description:
The first time you heal a damaged ally each round, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
cards.flavorText: "What you give of yourself to help others will be returned to you a hundredfold. This is the power of giving. Generosity is a gift that heals the giver as well, in mind, body, and spirit."

cards.title: Soraka
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
cards.flavorText: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."

cards.title: Soraka's Wish
cards.description:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Soraka</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka

cards.title: Soulspinner
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> if an ally died this round.
cards.flavorText: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."

cards.title: Spiral Stairs
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Seed of Strength</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText:
"Here's da first stop on da tour! I call this da leg wobbler because WOWEE are dere a lot steps! Pretty cool view too, an' dat's one of the best things in Targon. Okay let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2

cards.title: Splinter Soul
cards.description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> and 1|1.
cards.flavorText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

cards.title: Spoils of War
cards.description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant +2|+4 instead.
cards.flavorText: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna

cards.title: Spring Guardian
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Spring Gifts</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."

cards.title: Strafing Strike
cards.description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
cards.flavorText: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.

cards.title: Succession
cards.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.

cards.title: Sump Dredger
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
cards.flavorText: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.

cards.title: Tahm Kench's Bayou Brunch
cards.description:
An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench

cards.title: Tail of the Dragon
cards.description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Concussive Palm</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.title: Take Heart
cards.description: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
cards.flavorText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

cards.title: Tall Tales
cards.description: If you have a Yeti, summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link>. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
cards.flavorText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger

cards.title: Tasty Faefolk
cards.flavorText: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...

cards.title: The Grand Plaza
cards.description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.

cards.title: The Scargrounds
cards.description: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.

cards.title: The Slaughter Docks
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1. If you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.

cards.title: The Trickster
cards.flavorText: "So, there I was going 'bout my day, when in struts this fella packed to the gills with gold. Easy mark, eh? I sidle over, amp up the charm, and amp up the price. It's only when I put my coins away I realize the little scamp's paid me with my OWN money! The Trickster was shining bright that night, I tell ya." - Yordle Grifter

cards.title: The Undying
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...

cards.title: Thorn of the Rose
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.guile><style=AssociatedCard>Guile</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy

cards.title: Trevor Snoozebottom
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Create an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mumblesprite</style></link> with my supported ally's stats.
cards.flavorText: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.

cards.title: Twin Disciplines
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma

cards.title: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card
cards.description:
Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Twisted Fate</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

cards.title: Unraveled Earth
cards.description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.

cards.title: Used Cask Salesman
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Caustic Casks</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."

cards.title: Vanguard Redeemer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
cards.flavorText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"

cards.title: Vanguard Sergeant
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign

cards.title: Vault Breaker
cards.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

cards.title: Vi's Vault Breaker
cards.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Vault Breaker</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vi</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

cards.title: Vilemaw
cards.flavorText: "Who is your god? What can your god do? Will he let you wither and die defending him? Or will he give you life and vitality like no mortal has ever known? Why serve a god who won't serve you?" - Elise

cards.title: Vision
cards.description: When cast or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain

cards.title: Whirling Death
cards.description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
cards.flavorText: "I have the best job." - Draven

cards.title: Wish
cards.description: Fully heal damaged allies.
cards.flavorText: "For life!" - Soraka

cards.title: Wyrding Stones
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Get an extra mana gem this round.
cards.flavorText: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe

cards.title: Xenotype Researchers
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
cards.flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.

cards.title: Yusari the Slayer
cards.flavorText: "Oh, yes. The shadows of the Order will suit our new dark intentions."

cards.title: Zed
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats and keywords.
cards.flavorText: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."

cards.title: Zed
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats.
cards.flavorText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."

cards.title: Zed's Shadowshift
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zed</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

cards.title: Zenith Blade
cards.description:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zenith Blade</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest

cards.title: Aftershock
cards.description: Deal 3 to anything or destroy a landmark.
cards.flavorText: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor

cards.title: Ancient Crocolith
cards.description: To play me, kill 2 allies.
cards.flavorText:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."

cards.title: Ashe
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
cards.flavorText: "You are not our enemy. Our true foe is the long, lawless winter. We are all people of the Freljord, and this land belongs to all of us!"

cards.title: Ashe
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."

cards.title: Astral Protection
cards.description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
cards.flavorText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector

cards.title: Avalanche
cards.description: Deal 2 to ALL units.
cards.flavorText: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.

cards.title: Avarosan Outriders
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.

cards.title: Babbling Bjerg
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
cards.flavorText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"

cards.title: Baccai Sandspinner
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.

cards.title: Back Alley Barkeep
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a card from your regions for each <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Back Alley Barkeep</style></link> you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."

cards.title: Basilisk Rider
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.

cards.title: Bastion
cards.description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Honor the mountain." - Taric

cards.title: Blighted Ravine
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
cards.flavorText: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.

cards.title: Bloodsworn Pledge
cards.description: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
cards.flavorText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere

cards.title: Bloody Business
cards.description: An ally with 5+ Power <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc

cards.title: Brash Gambler
cards.description:
To play me, discard 2.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Draw 2 and give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."

cards.title: Braum
cards.description: When I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder

cards.title: Braum
cards.description: The first time I survive damage, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mighty Poro</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"

cards.title: Broadbacked Protector
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
cards.flavorText: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"

cards.title: Brutal Hunter
cards.description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."

cards.title: Bull Elnuk
cards.flavorText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.

cards.title: Callous Bonecrusher
cards.description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."

cards.title: Chronicler of Ruin
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally, then revive it.
cards.flavorText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.

cards.title: Chum the Waters
cards.description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Longtooth</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Shark!" - Fizz

cards.title: Chump Whump
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mushroom Clouds</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler

cards.title: Citybreaker
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”

cards.title: Coastal Defender
cards.description: When you summon an ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter

cards.title: Concussive Palm
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy to summon a <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Tail of the Dragon</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon

cards.title: Crimson Awakener
cards.description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
cards.flavorText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."

cards.title: Crowd Favorite
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
cards.flavorText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.

cards.title: Crumbling Sands
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Those who oppose us will be reduced to dust." - Azir

cards.title: Crystal Ibex
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.

cards.title: Deny
cards.description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: No.

cards.title: Desert Naturalist
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary

cards.title: Desert's Wrath
cards.description:
Grant allied <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.

cards.title: Dragon Shyvana
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Strafing Strike</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText:
"The first time I witnessed her transformation, I beheld her with revulsion. There was Yvva, replete in fire and fury! If only I had known then what I know now--that she would become our sister in arms, an exemplary soldier... and my dear, dear friend."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

cards.title: Earth Elemental
cards.description: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText:
"Okay, so dis is CLIFF! He's a big ol' fella who's been aroun' da block QUITE A FEW times let me tell you. An' I know dat he looks cool and I know dat he seems like a nice guy, but he's got a lotta heavy stuff on his back, and sometimes it falls on people so BE CAREFUL okay? Thank you moving on!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 4

cards.title: Eminent Benefactor
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand an Epic card from your regions.
cards.flavorText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."

cards.title: Encroaching Shadows
cards.description: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

cards.title: Fae Guide
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."

cards.title: Field Musicians
cards.description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.

cards.title: Fiora's Riposte
cards.description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiora</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

cards.title: Fizz's Playful Trickster
cards.description:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fizz</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

cards.title: Funsmith
cards.description: All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
cards.flavorText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"

cards.title: Fury of the North
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

cards.title: Gallant Rider
cards.description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.

cards.title: Golden Aegis
cards.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV

cards.title: Golden Ambassador
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"

cards.title: Gotcha!
cards.description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
cards.flavorText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"

cards.title: Grizzled Ranger
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Loyal Badgerbear</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."

cards.title: Ground Slam
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> a unit. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
cards.flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip

cards.title: Homecoming
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally unit or landmark to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>recall</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
cards.flavorText: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house

cards.title: Hunting Fleet
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Narwhal</style></link> for your opponent.
cards.flavorText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.

cards.title: Insightful Investigator
cards.description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook

cards.title: Island Navigator
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous

cards.title: Jinx
cards.flavorText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"

cards.title: Jinx
cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time you empty your hand, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Super Mega Death Rocket!</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"

cards.title: Katarina
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
cards.flavorText: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian border guard

cards.title: Kinkou Lifeblade
cards.flavorText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."

cards.title: Kinkou Wayfinder
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
cards.flavorText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.

cards.title: Laurent Bladekeeper
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."

cards.title: Laurent Chevalier
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create in hand another <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> follower from your regions.
cards.flavorText: "...Good grief." - Fiora

cards.title: LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>LeBlanc</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.

cards.title: Legion Veteran
cards.description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.

cards.title: Leona
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.

cards.title: Leona
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: This was what Leona had prepared for. She knew she would find Diana fleeing down the mountain, retreating before the light of the sun. She breathed deeply to still her fluttering heartbeat, willing it silent with grim resolve. This time upon their meeting, she had the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.

cards.title: Loaded Dice
cards.description: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
cards.flavorText: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench

cards.title: Longtooth
cards.flavorText: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.

cards.title: Lost Riches
cards.description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
cards.flavorText: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher

cards.title: Lulu's Whimsy!
cards.description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lulu</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu

cards.title: Mageseeker Inciter
cards.description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
cards.flavorText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook

cards.title: Malphite's Ground Slam
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> a unit. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Malphite</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip

cards.title: Maokai
cards.description: Each round, the first time you play another ally, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.

cards.title: Maokai
cards.description:
When I Level Up, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.

cards.title: Mk4: Stormlobber
cards.flavorText:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4

cards.title: Mountain Scryer
cards.description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."

cards.title: Mystifying Magician
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
cards.flavorText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"

cards.title: Nautilus's Riptide
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link> into your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

cards.title: Nocturne
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
cards.flavorText:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

cards.title: Nocturne
cards.description:
Other allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
When you play a unit, give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
cards.flavorText:
"My dreams grow more vivid with each passing night. I see a creature of pure evil, writhing in the dark, twisting its way toward me. Though I was to be stationed here for another week, I have just paid for transport to Fossbarrow this evening. Plainly, I cannot stand this place."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

cards.title: Playful Trickster
cards.description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

cards.title: Powder Pandemonium
cards.description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link> and give a random enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round for each time you've activated <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune

cards.title: Professor von Yipp
cards.description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."

cards.title: Profiteer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."

cards.title: Promising Future
cards.description: Grant an allied landmark "My <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> completion effect activates twice".
cards.flavorText: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean

cards.title: Ren Shadowblade
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”

cards.title: Renekton
cards.description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Renekton
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +3|+3 this round.
cards.flavorText: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Renekton
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link>When I block or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Riposte
cards.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

cards.title: Riptide
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

cards.title: Risen Mists
cards.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.

cards.title: Rite of Dominance
cards.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
cards.flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton

cards.title: Rite of Dominance
cards.description: Kill an ally to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.

cards.title: Rite of Dominance
cards.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.

cards.title: Rite of Negation
cards.description: Kill an ally to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.

cards.title: Rite of Negation
cards.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.

cards.title: Rite of Negation
cards.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.

cards.title: Salt Spire
cards.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+2. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.

cards.title: Salvage
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2.
Draw 2.
cards.flavorText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk before all's lost to the deep.

cards.title: Sandcrafter
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.

cards.title: Sejuani's Fury of the North
cards.description:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

cards.title: Shady Character
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
cards.flavorText: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"

cards.title: Shards of the Mountain
cards.description: Fill your hand with <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric

cards.title: Shen
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, give it +3|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other."

cards.title: Shen
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."

cards.title: Shiraza the Blade
cards.description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."

cards.title: Shrieking Spinner
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise

cards.title: Shyvana
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

cards.title: Sigil of Malice
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
cards.flavorText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.

cards.title: Silverwing Diver
cards.flavorText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.

cards.title: Silverwing Vanguard
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
cards.flavorText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.

cards.title: Sivir
cards.flavorText: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.

cards.title: Sivir
cards.description: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
cards.flavorText: "If you wanna work with me, I'll give you the same talk I give everyone: work for your share, and you'll get everything you're due. But if you slow me down, or get in my way, I'll kill you myself."

cards.title: Solari Sunforger
cards.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.

cards.title: Spirit Leech
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to draw 2.
cards.flavorText: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.

cards.title: Spirit's Refuge
cards.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen

cards.title: Stand Alone
cards.description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
cards.flavorText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.

cards.title: Stargazer
cards.description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."

cards.title: Statikk Shock
cards.description:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger

cards.title: Succumb to the Cold
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "The cold elicits many reactions. Let us find out yours." - Lissandra

cards.title: Suit Up!
cards.description:
When drawn, costs 2 less this round.
Grow an ally to 4|4.
cards.flavorText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

cards.title: Sumpsnipe Scavenger
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sumpworks Map</style></link> in hand. It costs 0 this round.
cards.flavorText: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.

cards.title: Swole Squirrel
cards.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Double my Power.
cards.flavorText: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.

cards.title: Tahm Kench
cards.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
cards.flavorText: "You struck a deal, my friend, and though you will undoubtedly bask in its benefits, remember... there will be a time when I get my fill, too."

cards.title: Tahm Kench
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."

cards.title: Taric
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give me and my supported ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
cards.flavorText: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer

cards.title: Taric
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
cards.flavorText: "Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer

cards.title: The Beast Below
cards.description: <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam

cards.title: The Box
cards.description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
cards.flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

cards.title: The Fangs
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
cards.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer

cards.title: The Traveler
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "We were always one and the same--we were separated only by the mountain, the journey, and a sea of stars."

cards.title: The Veiled Temple
cards.description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +1|+0. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.

cards.title: Thresh's The Box
cards.description:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Thresh</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

cards.title: Tri-beam Improbulator
cards.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random <style=Variable>1</style> cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
cards.flavorText: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger

cards.title: Troll Ravager
cards.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.

cards.title: Twisted Fate
cards.description: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
cards.flavorText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."

cards.title: Twisted Fate
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play a Destiny Card.
cards.flavorText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."

cards.title: Vanguard Bannerman
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard

cards.title: Vanguard Firstblade
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.

cards.title: Vanguard Squire
cards.description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
cards.flavorText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire

cards.title: Viktor
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."

cards.title: Viktor
cards.description:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Ah, Piltover. As a boy, I looked up to you, the shining 'City of Progress'. But as a man, I see its corrupt foundations, built atop the suffering of our home, Zaun. Today, we herald a new era of Zaunite innovation--and you will be the first to witness our rise!"

cards.title: Voice of the Risen
cards.description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."

cards.title: Weight of Judgment
cards.description: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
cards.flavorText: "One life in return for so many. One life so that others might thrive." - Nasus

cards.title: Whimsy!
cards.description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round.
cards.flavorText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu

cards.title: Whispered Words
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
Draw 2.
cards.flavorText: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.

cards.title: Whiteflame Protector
cards.flavorText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.

cards.title: Wolfrider
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Get an empty mana gem.
cards.flavorText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.

cards.title: Wraithcaller
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.

cards.title: Written in Stars
cards.description: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "The vastness of the night sky represents the gulf between humanity below and the divine above. But there are some mortals who strive to achieve a higher purpose, and if the mountain deems them worthy, they may rise to become one with the stars themselves." - Mountain Scryer

cards.title: Yasuo
cards.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I strike it.
cards.flavorText: "...always by my side."

cards.title: Yasuo
cards.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
cards.flavorText: "Death is like the wind..."

cards.title: Yordle Grifter
cards.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Warning Shot</style></link> in hand.
