cards.flavorText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."

cards.title: Zap Sprayfin
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
cards.flavorText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.

cards.title: Abyssal Eye
cards.description:
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"

cards.title: Accelerated Purrsuit
cards.description: If you've played <style=Variable>15</style> cards with different names this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan project engineer

cards.title: Arachnoid Host
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
cards.flavorText: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.

cards.title: Avarosan Hearthguard
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
cards.flavorText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."

cards.title: Blessing of Targon
cards.description: Grant an ally +3|+3.
cards.flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric

cards.title: Blossoming Blade
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 2.
cards.flavorText:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

cards.title: Catalyst of Aeons
cards.description: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
cards.flavorText: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.

cards.title: Chempunk Shredder
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies.
cards.flavorText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper

cards.title: Cold Resistance
cards.description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall

cards.title: Concerted Strike
cards.description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> it.
cards.flavorText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden

cards.title: Crumble
cards.description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
cards.flavorText: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.

cards.title: Darius's Decimate
cards.description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

cards.title: Decimate
cards.description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

cards.title: Decisive Maneuver
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain

cards.title: Deep Meditation
cards.description:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
cards.flavorText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.

cards.title: Detain
cards.description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
cards.flavorText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

cards.title: Draklorn Inquisitor
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If the <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> of any of your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> is 4 or less, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them to 0.
cards.flavorText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."

cards.title: Duskrider
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.

cards.title: Entomb
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
cards.flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra

cards.title: Ethereal Remitter
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
cards.flavorText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!

cards.title: Eye of the Ra-Horak
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Summon a copy of me with <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 2.
cards.flavorText: "Let the sun shed Her light upon us. Those who are weak and unworthy will cower before Her gaze!" - Solari Priestess

cards.title: Fused Firebrand
cards.flavorText: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.

cards.title: Gangplank
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand

cards.title: Gangplank
cards.description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer

cards.title: Garen
cards.flavorText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.

cards.title: Garen
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”

cards.title: General's Palace
cards.description:
Enemies are <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Observe our god-emperor! He knows the power of these lands better than any, and his army only grows. Shurima is risen, and it shall never fall again!" - Voice of the Risen

cards.title: Go Get It
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'

cards.title: Golden Herald
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> and grant them +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: Now more powerful than ever, Azir has raised his most loyal soldiers to lead his armies.

cards.title: Grasp of the Undying
cards.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 3 from any unit.
cards.flavorText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.

cards.title: Greathorn Companion
cards.flavorText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.

cards.title: Grumpy Rockbear
cards.flavorText:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary

cards.title: Heimerdinger
cards.description: When you cast a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "PROGRESSSSS!"

cards.title: Heimerdinger
cards.description: When you cast a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"

cards.title: Iceborn Legacy
cards.description: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian

cards.title: Intimidating Roar
cards.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies with 4 or less Power.
cards.flavorText: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster

cards.title: Jack, the Winner
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sleep with the Fishes</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.

cards.title: Jeweled Protector
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
cards.flavorText:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands

cards.title: Kato The Arm
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."

cards.title: Keelbreaker
cards.description:
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
cards.flavorText: The deckhands roared as one and hauled the chains, their treasure now just below the calm waters. Little did they know the Seascraw's legendary cannon had one final act in store.

cards.title: Kindred
cards.description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
cards.flavorText:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.

cards.title: Kindred
cards.description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
cards.flavorText:
Death took the form of hunters 
None escape such as they
One cajoles with arrows and bow
One chases down its prey.

cards.title: Kindred's Spirit Journey
cards.description:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kindred</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb

cards.title: Lee Sin
cards.description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
I <link=card.attackSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Rage</style></link> enemies that I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."

cards.title: Lee Sin
cards.description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."

cards.title: Legion General
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.

cards.title: Leona's Morning Light
cards.description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Leona</style></link> in your deck.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
cards.flavorText:
"She is our unflinching leader in the heavens, the blinding flash of our weapons at noon, and the unquenchable fire that burns in our hearts." 
- Solari Priestess

cards.title: Lissandra's Entomb
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lissandra</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra

cards.title: Mechanized Mimic
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me all keywords on allies.
cards.flavorText: "I'm just like you, only better."

cards.title: Meteor Shower
cards.description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
cards.flavorText: "Forging stars is a messy business, I'm afraid. You never know where those little rocks will land. I am so terribly, terribly sorry if they happen to fall on you. And crush you. Oh so violently." - Aurelion Sol

cards.title: Midenstokke Henchmen
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of me.
cards.flavorText:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."

cards.title: Mk5: Rocket Blaster
cards.flavorText:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5

cards.title: Moondreamer
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"

cards.title: Moonlight Affliction
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> 2 enemy units this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: They can't block this round.
cards.flavorText: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana

cards.title: Morning Light
cards.description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
cards.flavorText: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona

cards.title: Mountain Sojourners
cards.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
cards.flavorText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.

cards.title: Nasus' Siphoning Strike
cards.description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus

cards.title: Neverglade Collector
cards.description: When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal

cards.title: Noxkraya Arena
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally and the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
cards.flavorText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster

cards.title: Out Of The Way
cards.description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
cards.flavorText:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'

cards.title: Pack Your Bags
cards.description: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> back to <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Go Hard</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Sorry for the bad news sorry I’m so bad
Only took a minute for me to get all you had
Sorry for the bad news know it makes you sad
I’ll be here for a minute baby you should pack your bags"
- Evelynn, 'THE BADDEST'

cards.title: Platewyrm Egg
cards.description:
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Vicious Platewyrms</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The grizzled captain held his shining quarry aloft and roared out "This'll keep us fer life!" Heady cheers rang out from the crew, while around their brig, the waters began to churn...

cards.title: Possession
cards.description: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
cards.flavorText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.

cards.title: Preservationist
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>Advance</style></link> an allied landmark 3 rounds.
cards.flavorText: Whenever he seeks a moment's peace, Zilean returns to Icathia's last garden, just as he remembers it.

cards.title: Purrsuit of Perfection
cards.description: If you've played <style=Variable>20</style> cards with different names this game, summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Catastrophe</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer

cards.title: Quinn
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight

cards.title: Quinn
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"

cards.title: Radiant Guardian
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
cards.flavorText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign

cards.title: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random non-champion <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
cards.flavorText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"

cards.title: Rampaging Baccai
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 4+ units this game, an enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.

cards.title: Razorscale Hunter
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher

cards.title: Resplendent Stellacorn
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
cards.flavorText: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars

cards.title: Rimetusk Shaman
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."

cards.title: Ruin Runner
cards.flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.

cards.title: Sandswept Tomb
cards.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: As they passed through the ravine, the Sandcrafter spoke the words of magic. A gust of wind echoed through the canyon and turned to the thunder of oncoming hooves.

cards.title: Scarmaiden Reaver
cards.flavorText: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"

cards.title: Screeching Dragon
cards.flavorText: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.

cards.title: Shadows of the Past
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> each ally and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
cards.flavorText: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed

cards.title: Shunpo
cards.description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.

cards.title: Siphoning Strike
cards.description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus

cards.title: Slippery Waverider
cards.flavorText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer

cards.title: Sneaky Zeebles
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
cards.flavorText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.

cards.title: Spirit Journey
cards.description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
cards.flavorText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb

cards.title: Starshaping
cards.description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
cards.flavorText: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol

cards.title: Stormclaw Ursine
cards.description: Other allies with 5+ Power have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.

cards.title: Subpurrsible
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other cards with different names, grant me +4|+0. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...

cards.title: Survival Skills
cards.description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
cards.flavorText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker

cards.title: Swain
cards.description:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> backrow enemy.
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."

cards.title: Swain
cards.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."

cards.title: Swiftwing Lancer
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a random Elite in hand.
cards.flavorText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen

cards.title: Taliyah
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
cards.flavorText: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.

cards.title: Taliyah
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
cards.flavorText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima

cards.title: Targon's Peak
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a random card in each player's hand to 0 this round.
cards.flavorText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.

cards.title: Taric's Blessing of Targon
cards.description:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taric</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric

cards.title: Tarkaz the Tribeless
cards.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
cards.flavorText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere

cards.title: The Cloven Way
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer

cards.title: The University of Piltover
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.

cards.title: The Warrior
cards.flavorText: The strongest star in the night's sky, they say, is that of the warrior. An ancient being, thought immortal, who descends from the stars to prove his worth in combat. Never has he been beaten, but all stories must end, and all stars must die.

cards.title: Thresh
cards.description: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
cards.flavorText: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...

cards.title: Thresh
cards.flavorText:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."

cards.title: Tortured Prodigy
cards.description: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
cards.flavorText: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.

cards.title: Treasure Trove
cards.description:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
If I'm <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link>, draw me instead.
cards.flavorText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.

cards.title: Trifarian Assessor
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
cards.flavorText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General

cards.title: Trifarian Shieldbreaker
cards.flavorText: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius

cards.title: Troop of Elnuks
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and shuffle the rest into your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna

cards.title: Trundle
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"

cards.title: Trundle
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The Avarosans refused. Trundle gestured, and, like an avalanche, the trolls descended with such momentum that it carried them on for miles afterward, deep into the Avarosan tribelands, battering and breaking everything in their path without reserve.

cards.title: Unstable Voltician
cards.description: Grant me +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
cards.flavorText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.

cards.title: Ursine Spiritwalker
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I transform into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Stormclaw Ursine</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.

cards.title: Vanguard Cavalry
cards.flavorText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.

cards.title: Vaults of Helia
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
cards.flavorText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?

cards.title: Vi
cards.description: When I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link> a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "So! Looks like your buddies are all tuckered out. You wanna tell me where you hid the hextech, or d'ya wanna make friends with the wall, too?"

cards.title: Vi
cards.description: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0). <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator

cards.title: Vicious Platewyrm
cards.flavorText: The terrifying beasts burst through the waves and split the hull with vice-like jaws. Though the sailors begged the Bearded Lady for mercy, their captain's greed had already sealed their fate.

cards.title: Vladimir
cards.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."

cards.title: Vladimir
cards.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...

cards.title: Wild Claws
cards.description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster

cards.title: Will of Ionia
cards.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
cards.flavorText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.

cards.title: Withering Wail
cards.description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
cards.flavorText: That which kills us makes them stronger.

cards.title: Wrathful Rider
cards.flavorText: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."

cards.title: Yusari
cards.flavorText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."

cards.title: Alpha Wildclaw
cards.flavorText: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.

cards.title: Anivia
cards.description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."

cards.title: Anivia
cards.description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Revive me transformed into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Eggnivia</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."

cards.title: Anivia's Harsh Winds
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Anivia</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

cards.title: Ardent Tracker
cards.description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
cards.flavorText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.

cards.title: Armored Tuskrider
cards.description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
cards.flavorText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider

cards.title: Arrel the Tracker
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you cast a spell on me this round, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."

cards.title: Augmented Experimenter
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
cards.flavorText: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.

cards.title: Augur of the Old Ones
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.

cards.title: Aurok Glinthorn
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all damaged enemies.
cards.flavorText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”

cards.title: Aurora Porealis
cards.description: Create 2 random Poros and 2 <link=card.snaxRef><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger

cards.title: Back to Back
cards.description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion

cards.title: Battering Ram
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +4|+0.
cards.flavorText:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."

cards.title: Brood Awakening
cards.description: Summon 3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderlings</style></link>, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
cards.flavorText: They're hungriest when they hatch.

cards.title: Chief Mechanist Zevi
cards.description: When you draw a card, give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> and create an exact copy of it in hand.
cards.flavorText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.

cards.title: Cithria the Bold
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”

cards.title: Citrus Courier
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."

cards.title: Cloud Drinker
cards.description: Your <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> spells cost 1 less.
cards.flavorText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.

cards.title: Cygnus the Moonstalker
cards.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me and an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.

cards.title: Darius
cards.flavorText: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"

cards.title: Darius
cards.flavorText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain

cards.title: Dawn and Dusk
cards.description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed

cards.title: Devourer of the Depths
cards.description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy with less Health than me.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

cards.title: Double Up
cards.description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
cards.flavorText: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune

cards.title: Dragonguard Lookout
cards.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia

cards.title: Falling Comet
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
cards.flavorText: "I will drive the stars themselves through this insufferable place. It will be GLORIOUS." - Aurelion Sol

cards.title: Fluft of Poros
cards.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Heart of the Fluft</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"

cards.title: For Demacia!
cards.description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
cards.flavorText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant

cards.title: Genevieve Elmheart
cards.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
cards.flavorText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.

cards.title: Harsh Winds
cards.description: <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> 2 enemies.
cards.flavorText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

cards.title: Heart of the Fluft
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Combine all of our Poros into a <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Fluft of Poros</style></link>, it gains their stats and keywords.
cards.flavorText:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."

cards.title: Hecarim
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.

cards.title: Hecarim
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> allies have +3|+0.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spectral Riders</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Listen. Hear him ride. The trampling of hooves. The creak of armor, long-worn and rusted. The ghostly cries of soldiers, echoes of the past. The resounding silence that follows.

cards.title: Hextech Transmogulator
cards.description: Transform a follower into another follower.
cards.flavorText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"

cards.title: Horns of the Dragon
cards.flavorText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon

cards.title: Illegal Contraption
cards.flavorText: "Absolutely NOT regulation hardware." - Safety Inspections Officer, Piltovan Bureau of Safety Inspections

cards.title: Inspiring Marshal
cards.description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
cards.flavorText: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.

cards.title: Inviolus Vox
cards.description: When an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons

cards.title: Jae Medarda
cards.description: When I'm targeted and survive, draw 1.
cards.flavorText: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.

cards.title: Jarvan IV
cards.description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.

cards.title: Jarvan IV
cards.description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cataclysm</style></link> in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.

cards.title: Karma
cards.description: When you play a spell, cast it again on the same targets.
cards.flavorText: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."

cards.title: Karma
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a spell from your regions.
cards.flavorText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."

cards.title: Khahiri the Returned
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, grant all allied copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.

cards.title: Lux
cards.description: When you cast 6+ mana of spells, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "No more holding back!"

cards.title: Lux
cards.flavorText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"

cards.title: Minotaur Reckoner
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy.
cards.flavorText: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."

cards.title: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone
cards.flavorText:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6

cards.title: Molten Breath
cards.description: An ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the two <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
cards.flavorText: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.

cards.title: Monster Harpoon
cards.description:
Deal 5 to a unit.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 3 less.
cards.flavorText: "The beast's been stuck already, lads! Now stick it again 'til it stops thrashin' and the waters've lost their blue!" - Jagged Taskmaster

cards.title: Nasus
cards.description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Nasus
cards.description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
Enemies have <nobr>-3|-0</nobr>.
cards.flavorText: "His hope revived by Shurima's rise, Nasus finally returned after years spent wandering the desert, eager to make amends with his brother. He never suspected he would find Renekton maddened by years spent suffering at Xerath's hands in the tomb, waiting for him." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Nasus
cards.description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
Enemies have <nobr>-1|-0</nobr>.
cards.flavorText: "For years, Nasus and his brother Renekton served the empire. Nasus was a scholar, Renekton a fierce warrior. It was not until the two were called upon to confront the betrayer, Xerath, that Nasus was forced to make a terrible choice..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

cards.title: Reckoning
cards.description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
cards.flavorText: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster

cards.title: Redoubled Valor
cards.description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
cards.flavorText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.

cards.title: Remembrance
cards.description: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
cards.flavorText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian

cards.title: Ricochet
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
cards.flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir

cards.title: Scarmother Vrynna
cards.description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
cards.flavorText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”

cards.title: Sejuani
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
cards.flavorText: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"

cards.title: Sejuani
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.

cards.title: Shadow Flare
cards.description: Grant ALL battling followers <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.

cards.title: Shen's Stand United
cards.description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

cards.title: Sheriff Lariette Rose
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.

cards.title: Sivir's Ricochet
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sivir</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir

cards.title: Soulgorger
cards.flavorText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

cards.title: Stand United
cards.description: Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

cards.title: Stonebreaker
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: From time to time, the great colossi of Targon awaken from their slumber and trek to new grounds atop the great mountain. These events are never quiet, and seldom safe.

cards.title: Strong-arm
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Place a follower in play into your hand.
cards.flavorText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer

cards.title: Sun Guardian
cards.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +4|+4 this round.
cards.flavorText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription

cards.title: Sunburst
cards.description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Instead, <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round and deal 6 to it.
cards.flavorText: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.

cards.title: The Golden Sister
cards.description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Silver Sister</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"From the heavens
Two beings came:
One was robed in silver's glow,
The other clad in golden flame..."
- Hymn of the Hours

cards.title: The Silver Sister
cards.flavorText:
"...Though both were formed of cosmic light,
They fought, for they were too alike.
And so these two split night from day,
So each could always have their way..."
- Hymn of the Hours

cards.title: Towering Stonehorn
cards.description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
cards.flavorText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.

cards.title: Unlicensed Innovation
cards.description: Summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Illegal Contraption</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan philanthropist

cards.title: Wiggly Burblefish
cards.description:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
cards.flavorText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker

cards.title: Wise Fry
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
cards.flavorText: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.

cards.title: Zephyr Sage
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zephyr Sage</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands

cards.title: Ancient Yeti
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Reduce my cost by 1.
cards.flavorText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.title: Ascended's Rise
cards.description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
cards.flavorText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir

cards.title: Atrocity
cards.description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
cards.flavorText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.

cards.title: Basilisk Bloodseeker
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
cards.flavorText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.

cards.title: Boomerang Blade
cards.description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> and <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
cards.flavorText: "Better duck." - Sivir

cards.title: Chronoshift
cards.description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
cards.flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean

cards.title: Cosmic Inspiration
cards.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: "Look to the night sky. Take in the stars' brilliance, and let them suffuse you with their healing light." - Soraka

cards.title: Dragon's Rage
cards.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
cards.flavorText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

cards.title: Eclipse Dragon
cards.description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random Dragon follower and Celestial follower in hand.
cards.flavorText:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

cards.title: Emperor's Divide
cards.description: Give enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round and summon 6 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "My soldiers march on." - Azir

cards.title: Eternal Gladiator
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: The <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
cards.flavorText: "Behold! See how our champion sits astride the lion? Even the king of beasts would yield to his power, for he is the Will of Azir!" - Voice of the Risen

cards.title: Icy Yeti
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Health.
cards.flavorText: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.title: Irelia's Vanguard's Edge
cards.description:
<link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 3. Pick an ally to attack with the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Irelia</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia

cards.title: King Jarvan III
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc

cards.title: Malphite
cards.description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you have the attack token, create an <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Unstoppable Force</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: "Boom boom boom!"

cards.title: Malphite
cards.flavorText:
"And here's da last stop on da Chip tour of Targon! It's PAPA! He's da BIGGEST of da Targon giants, an' sings a mean song, too, lemme tell ya. Just don't try to climb him! Da spikes tickle him, and you dun want him sneezin' when you're halfway up no sah!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 6

cards.title: Mind Meld
cards.description: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've played this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.

cards.title: Mk7: Armored Stomper
cards.flavorText:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7

cards.title: Nautilus
cards.description: When I Level Up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
cards.flavorText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note

cards.title: Nautilus
cards.description: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
cards.flavorText: All pay the tithe, one way or another.

cards.title: Overgrown Snapvine
cards.description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Overgrown Snapvine</style></link>.
cards.flavorText:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal

cards.title: Pack Mentality
cards.description: Give all allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.

cards.title: Raz Bloodmane
cards.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
cards.flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."

cards.title: Revitalizing Roar
cards.description:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Reduce its cost to 0.
cards.flavorText: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman

cards.title: Ritual of Renewal
cards.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
cards.flavorText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma

cards.title: Savage Reckoner
cards.flavorText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie

cards.title: Scrapshot
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
cards.flavorText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying

cards.title: Shipwreck Hoarder
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and create 2 Treasures in your deck.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher

cards.title: Smooth Soloist
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
cards.flavorText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter

cards.title: Spirit Fire
cards.description: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Deal 2 to me" this round.
cards.flavorText: "Their spirits will burn." - Nasus

cards.title: Stalking Broodmother
cards.flavorText: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

cards.title: The Destroyer
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "To safeguard the spaces between land and sky, a horned guardian was placed in the stars over the mountains. Sturdy and swift, it traverses the night sky in search of intruders, whom it greets with an impact that sends shudders through earth and sky alike." - The Minotaur Histories

cards.title: The Empyrean
cards.flavorText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General

cards.title: The Etherfiend
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
cards.flavorText: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor

cards.title: The Howling Abyss
cards.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
cards.flavorText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.

cards.title: The Rekindler
cards.description: When I'm summoned, revive the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> dead allied champion.
cards.flavorText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?

cards.title: The Syren
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link>.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
cards.flavorText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.

cards.title: They Who Endure
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper

cards.title: Trueshot Barrage
cards.description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
cards.flavorText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal

cards.title: Vanguard's Edge
cards.description: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 3. Pick an ally to attack with the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia

cards.title: Vengeance
cards.description: Kill a unit.
cards.flavorText: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.

cards.title: Windfarer Hatchling
cards.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
cards.flavorText:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands

cards.title: Winter's Breath
cards.description: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
cards.flavorText: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.

cards.title: Yone, Windchaser
