cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
cards.flavorText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."

cards.title: Zilean's Chronoshift
cards.description:
Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zilean</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean

cards.title: Battle Fury
cards.description: Grant an ally +8|+4.
cards.flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

cards.title: Captain Arrika
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
cards.flavorText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.

cards.title: Captain Farron
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Decimates</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.

cards.title: Cosmic Rays
cards.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Power.
cards.flavorText: In the dark beginning, a spark of creation rippled through the universe. What sound it made, what light it shone, we will never know, for there were not yet then words to describe, nor yet ears or eyes to perceive it.

cards.title: Destiny's Call
cards.description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
cards.flavorText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric

cards.title: For The Fallen
cards.description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen

cards.title: Frostguard Thrall
cards.flavorText: Freed from its icy tomb, the corrupted troll knew one thing, and one thing only - it must do as its dark mistress commanded.

cards.title: Garen's Judgment
cards.description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Garen</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.

cards.title: Give It All
cards.description:
Raise all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
cards.flavorText:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'

cards.title: Grandfather Rumul
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
cards.flavorText: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd

cards.title: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!
cards.description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Heimerdinger</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

cards.title: Ice Pillar
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Refill 8 mana.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Give the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "Haha! You didn't see that coming!" - Trundle

cards.title: Icequake
cards.description: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
cards.flavorText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle

cards.title: Incisive Tactician
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 6. <style=Variable></style>
When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Within the inner chambers of the Black Rose, Noxian nobles play their pieces, and murder befalls distant victims.

cards.title: It That Stares
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks or deal 2 to ALL other units.
cards.flavorText: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard

cards.title: Judgment
cards.description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
cards.flavorText: Justice always comes full circle.

cards.title: Progress Day!
cards.description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
cards.flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

cards.title: Reinforcements
cards.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
cards.flavorText:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code

cards.title: Rhasa the Sunderer
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill the 2 <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies if an ally died this round.
cards.flavorText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

cards.title: Riptide Rex
cards.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Cast <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Cannon Barrage</style></link> 6 times on randomly targeted enemies.
cards.flavorText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"

cards.title: Sanctum Conservator
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me. <style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.

cards.title: Spectral Matron
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.

cards.title: Strength in Numbers
cards.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion Marauders</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.

cards.title: Sunk Cost
cards.description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
cards.flavorText: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench

cards.title: T-Hex
cards.flavorText:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8

cards.title: Terror of the Tides
cards.description:
Sea Monster allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>. 
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
cards.flavorText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.

cards.title: The Clock Hand
cards.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Instant Centuries</style></link> in hand.
cards.flavorText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.

cards.title: The Dreadway
cards.description: When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link>. Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
cards.flavorText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"

cards.title: The Immortal Fire
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
cards.flavorText: "For ages, the Immortal Fire flew alone, till one day she saw a young bird with fiery golden wings like hers. She rejoiced, for she had never known another like herself. But as years passed, the young bird grew old and flickered out. The Immortal Fire grieved, for she had never known death. And so she wept sparks and sighed herself ablaze, till she emerged, renewed in body but burdened with knowledge." - Shuriman folk tale

cards.title: The Infinite Mindsplitter
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 2 enemies.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> them.
cards.flavorText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.

cards.title: The Leviathan
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
cards.flavorText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.

cards.title: The Tuskraider
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard

cards.title: Tianna Crownguard
cards.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”

cards.title: Trundle's Icequake
cards.description:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Trundle</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle

cards.title: Tryndamere
cards.flavorText: "...And make THEM die for it."

cards.title: Tryndamere
cards.flavorText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."

cards.title: Tryndamere's Battle Fury
cards.description:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tryndamere</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

cards.title: Unyielding Spirit
cards.description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
cards.flavorText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.

cards.title: Uzgar the Ancient
cards.flavorText:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"

cards.title: Voices of the Old Ones
cards.description:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
cards.flavorText: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.

cards.title: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
cards.description:
When you <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link>, I attack with the <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blades</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.BladeDance><style=Vocab>Blade Dance</style></link> 1.
cards.flavorText: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"

cards.title: Brightsteel Formation
cards.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen

cards.title: Buried in Ice
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> each enemy to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
cards.flavorText: "The cold overcomes all, eventually." - Lissandra

cards.title: Commander Ledros
cards.description:
<link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Return me to hand.
cards.flavorText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.

cards.title: Corina Veraza
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
cards.flavorText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."

cards.title: Kadregrin the Infernal
cards.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
cards.flavorText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.

cards.title: Minah Swiftfoot
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
cards.flavorText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand

cards.title: Sandstorm
cards.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 3 enemy units or landmarks.
cards.flavorText: The storm rolls in with a peal like thunder, and when it passes, it leaves nothing behind.

cards.title: Supernova
cards.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 2 enemy units or landmarks.
cards.flavorText: Dying stars create explosions so bright and powerful that even other stars, still lively and burning, are easily outshone.

cards.title: The Great Beyond
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
I am a Dragon.
cards.flavorText: "Oh yes, my favorite constellation. I like to think it will be the first to rain down upon this forsaken mountain." - Aurelion Sol

cards.title: The Harrowing
cards.description: Revive the 6 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> allies that died this game and grant them <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.

cards.title: The Ruination
cards.description: Kill ALL units.
cards.flavorText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.

cards.title: Arbiter of the Peak
cards.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
cards.flavorText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.

cards.title: Ascended's Call
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> and <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link>. Immediately level them up to level 3.
cards.flavorText: "They will serve their emperor. My generals will make sure of it." - Azir

cards.title: Aurelion Sol
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
cards.flavorText: Aurelion Sol is handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very inteligent.

cards.title: Aurelion Sol
cards.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
cards.flavorText: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"

cards.title: Cithria, Lady of Clouds
cards.description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III

cards.title: Living Legends
cards.description: Fill your hand with random <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
cards.flavorText: "They say that some constellations were once mortals whose exceptional exploits earned them a place amongst the stars." - Mountain Scryer

cards.title: Plaza Guardian
cards.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
cards.flavorText: You have twenty seconds to comply.

cards.title: Scuttlegeist
cards.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each ally that died this game.
cards.flavorText: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.

cards.title: She Who Wanders
cards.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL followers with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
cards.flavorText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer

cards.title: Singular Will
cards.description: Pick an ally. <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> ALL other units and landmarks.
cards.flavorText: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk

cards.title: The Scourge
cards.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
cards.flavorText: Legends speak of a Scourge that lurks at the furthest reaches of the Celestial Realm. Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.

cards.title: Feel The Rush
cards.description: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Raise their stats up to 10|10.
cards.flavorText:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'

cards.title: Sandstone Chimera
cards.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
cards.flavorText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.

cards.title: Warmother's Call
cards.description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
cards.flavorText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.

cards.title: Aurelion Sol's The Skies Descend
cards.description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aurelion Sol</style></link> in your deck.
cards.flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol

cards.title: The Skies Descend
cards.description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
cards.flavorText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol

cards.title: Watcher
cards.description:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 4+ allies that cost 8+ this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck.
cards.flavorText: "This is the end. As it was foretold -- as I promised. Sisters... forgive me." - Lissandra
